metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of airborne WiDAS mission in the Linze station-Linze grassland flight zone on Jun. 29, 2008
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：临泽站-临泽草地站飞行区机载WiDAS数据集（2008年6月29日）
metadata.description:
The dataset of airborne WiDAS mission was obtained in the Linze station-Linze grassland flight zone on Jun. 29, 2008.
     Data available for general users include Level-2C data (after geometric, radiometric and atmospheric corrections), Level-1B browse image (after intra-band matchingintra-band) and Level-2B browse image (intra-bandafter registration). The raw data, Level-1A, and data processing parameters were filed; applications would be evaluated prior to access. Data processing started in Aug. 2008 and ended in Apr. 2009, and in Nov. 2009, CCD data were reprocessed to adjust radiometric calibration. 
     The flying time of each route was as follows:

{|
! id 
! flight
! relative height
! starttime
! endtime
! data size
! data state
! data quality
! ground targets 
|-
| 1 || 1#13 || 1500m || 11:44:35 || 11:50:31 ||  90 || processed;complete || good || Pingchuan reservoir 
|-
| 2 || 1#11 || 1500m || 11:55:55 || 12:01:55 || 91 || processed;complete || good || Linze grass station 
|-
| 3 || 1#9_1 || 1500m || 12:06:27 || 12:12:27 || 91 || incomplete || incomplete || Pingchuan reservoir 
|-
| 4 || 1#9_2 || 1500m || 13:01:35 || 13:07:43 || 93 || processed;complete || good || Pingchuan reservoir 
|-
| 5 || 1#7 || 1500m || 12:17:59 || 12:23:59 || 91 || processed;complete || good || desert transit plot 
|-
| 6 || 1#5 || 1500m || 12:28:35 || 12:34:31 || 　90 || processed;complete || good || North-south desert strip 
|-
| 7 || 1#3 || 1500m || 12:39:11 || 12:45:03 || 　89 || processed;complete || good || Pingchuan reservoir 
|-
| 8 || 1#1 || 1500m || 12:50:55 || 12:56:51 || 90 || processed;complete || good || Linze station
|}
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集为机载WiDAS传感器于2008年06月29日获取，地点在临泽站-临泽草地站飞行区。
原始数据经过几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正后发布，面向普通用户的数据产品为Level-2C产品（经过几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正），以及Level-1B（波段间配准）快视图和Level-2B（波段间配准）快视图。原始数据（Level-1A数据）和数据处理参数存档，需提交申请并通过审批后才能获得。数据处理时间为2008年8月-2009年4月，完成时间为2009年4月，2009年11月做了一次CCD相机辐射定标的订正。  
本数据集的原始数据包括8条航线，其中航线1#9_1受到云影的影响，故重飞一次为1#9_2。各航线的飞行时间如下表：
{|
! 序号
! 航线名称
! 相对航高
! 开始时间
! 结束时间
! 数据量（景）
! 数据状态
! 数据质量
! 主要地面目标 
|-
| 1 || 1#13 || 约1500米 || 11:44:35 || 11:50:31 ||  90 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 平川水库 
|-
| 2 || 1#11 || 约1500米 || 11:55:55 || 12:01:55 || 91 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 临泽草地站 
|-
| 3 || 1#9_1 || 约1500米 || 12:06:27 || 12:12:27 || 91 || 不完整，未处理 || 部分数据缺失或缺少波段 || 平川水库 
|-
| 4 || 1#9_2 || 约1500米 || 13:01:35 || 13:07:43 || 93 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 平川水库 
|-
| 5 || 1#7 || 约1500米 || 12:17:59 || 12:23:59 || 91 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 荒漠过渡带样方 
|-
| 6 || 1#5 || 约1500米 || 12:28:35 || 12:34:31 || 　90 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 荒漠南北样带 
|-
| 7 || 1#3 || 约1500米 || 12:39:11 || 12:45:03 || 　89 || 完整 ，已处理 || 好 || 平川水库 
|-
| 8 || 1#1 || 约1500米 || 12:50:55 || 12:56:51 || 90 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 临泽站
|}

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data products processed to Level-2C in remote sensing datasets?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据集中处理到Level-2C的数据产品的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: geometric correction, radiometric calibration, atmospheric correction
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 几何校正，辐射定标，大气校正

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors might cause data quality issues in airborne sensor datasets, specifically those related to cloud cover and sensor calibration?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 哪些因素可能导致机载传感器数据集中的数据质量问题，特别是与云层覆盖和传感器校准相关的问题？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data quality issues in airborne sensor datasets can be caused by several factors, such as cloud cover obscuring the sensor's view, leading to incomplete or missing data, as seen in the case of flight path 1#9_1. Additionally, sensor calibration errors can occur, requiring corrections, as was done in November 2009 for CCD camera radiation calibration.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 空气传感器数据集中的数据质量问题可能由多个因素引起，例如云层遮挡传感器的视野，导致数据不完整或缺失，正如在航班路径1#9_1中所见。此外，传感器校准错误也可能发生，需要进行修正，正如在2009年11月对CCD相机辐射校准所做的那样。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects on data quality and completeness when cloud cover impacts aerial data collection flights?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 当云层影响航空数据采集飞行时，对数据质量和完整性的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: When cloud cover impacts aerial data collection flights, it can result in incomplete datasets and the need for re-flights to obtain complete data. For example, in the dataset mentioned, one of the flight paths (1#9_1) was affected by cloud shadows, leading to a re-flight (1#9_2) to ensure data quality and completeness. This can increase the time and resources required for data collection and processing.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 当云层覆盖影响航空数据采集飞行时，可能导致数据集不完整，并需要重新飞行以获取完整数据。例如，在提到的数据集中，其中一条飞行路径（1#9_1）受到云影的影响，导致进行了重新飞行（1#9_2）以确保数据质量和完整性。这可能会增加数据采集和处理所需的时间和资源。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedures to geometrically correct, radiometrically calibrate, and atmospherically correct airborne sensor data to prepare it for general user accessibility in remote sensing applications?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正机载传感器数据以准备其在遥感应用中供一般用户使用的程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The original data from the airborne WiDAS sensor underwent geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction to be published for general user accessibility. The data processing occurred from August 2008 to April 2009, and a CCD camera radiometric calibration correction was made in November 2009.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 来自空中WiDAS传感器的原始数据经过几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正，以便发布供一般用户访问。数据处理发生在2008年8月至2009年4月之间，并且在2009年11月进行了CCD相机的辐射校准修正。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions and technological processes enable the production of Level-2C products from airborne remote sensing data in the context of integrated remote sensing experiments?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在综合遥感实验的背景下，哪些条件和技术过程使得从航空遥感数据中生产Level-2C产品成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The production of Level-2C products from airborne remote sensing data is enabled by processes such as geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction. These processes ensure that the data is accurate and suitable for general usage. The dataset includes original data that undergoes these corrections to become Level-2C products, which are then made available to users. Additionally, specific data processing times and correction updates, such as the CCD camera radiometric calibration correction in November 2009, are part of the enabling conditions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 从航空遥感数据生产Level-2C产品的过程包括几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正。这些过程确保数据的准确性和适用性。数据集包括经过这些校正的原始数据，转变为Level-2C产品，然后提供给用户。此外，特定的数据处理时间和校正更新，例如2009年11月的CCD相机辐射校正修正，也是启用条件的一部分。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the data processing techniques employed for airborne WiDAS sensor data, focusing on geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction methods used in the field.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析用于空气WiDAS传感器数据的数据处理技术，重点关注几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正方法在该领域的应用。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data processing techniques for airborne WiDAS sensor data include geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction. The processed data products available to users are Level-2C, which have undergone geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction. Additionally, quick-look images at Level-1B and Level-2B (inter-band registration) are available. The original data, referred to as Level-1A, and the processing parameters are archived and require an application and approval to access. The processing period was from August 2008 to April 2009, with a correction to the CCD camera's radiometric calibration made in November 2009.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 针对空中WiDAS传感器数据的数据处理技术包括几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正。可供用户使用的处理数据产品为Level-2C，经过几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正。此外，还提供Level-1B和Level-2B（波段间注册）的快速查看图像。原始数据称为Level-1A，处理参数被归档，访问需要申请和批准。处理周期为2008年8月至2009年4月，2009年11月对CCD相机的辐射校准进行了修正。
